articles.title: Indian police arrest man accused of running fake embassy
articles.description: Suspect allegedly claimed to be adviser or ambassador to made-up places such as ‘Seborga’ or ‘Westarctica’
articles.content:
Indian police have arrested a man accused of running a bogus embassy from a rented residential building near Delhi and recovered cars with fake diplomatic plates.
The suspect impersonated an ambassador and allegedly duped people for money by promisin... [916 chars]
